title: Crime Alert 12.12.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 12.12.19
description:
Texas deputy facing misdemeanor after strip-searching 6 women in 11 days. School bus driver busted for buying beer then getting back on the bus to pick up children.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
